metadata.title: Wednesday, 25th March, 2015
metadata.session: FOURTH SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Education, Science, Vocational Training and Early Education when the construction of staff houses at the following Primary Schools in Serenje District will commence
parts: (a)    Lupiya;
(b)    Muchinga;
(c)    Nganswa;
(d)    Mbanswa;
(e)    Kashishi;
(f)    Ndabala;
(g)    Malwita;
(h)    Kambobe;
(i)    Lumpampa; and
(j)    Kashitu.

questions.minister: Minister of Transport, Works, Supply and Communication
parts: (a)    how much money was allocated for the grading of the Kalabo-Tapo feeder road in 2014;
(b)    how much money was disbursed towards the project as of January, 2014;
(c)    what the outstanding balance was as of October, 2014;
(d)    why the works have stalled since January 2014;
(e)    when the works will resume; and
(f)    when the works are expected to be completed.

questions.minister: Minister of Transport, Works, Supply and Communication
parts: (a)    when speed control humps will be constructed at the Luangwa Bridge Market in Rufunsa Parliamentary Constituency;
(b)    what type of humps will be constructed; and
(c)    what the cost of the exercise is.

questions.minister: Minister of Transport, Works, Supply and Communication when rehabilitation of the Ndola Lime-Larfage Road in Kafulafuta Parliamentary Constituency will commence.
Minister of Transport, Works, Supply and Communication when the Government will construct the following bridges in Magoye Parliamentary Constituency
parts: (a)    Itebe to connect Itebe to Munenga Wards;
(b)    Hanzala in Nkonkola Ward;
(c)    Mweemba in Musuma Ward; and
(d)    Mabanga in Kalama Ward.

questions.minister: Minister of Transport, Works, Supply and Communication
parts: (a)    whether the Government is aware that there is a huge gully on the Kalabo-Sikongo Road near the airport area which if not attended to quickly will delink the two Districts of Kalabo and Sikongo; and
(b)    if so, what measures have been taken to protect the road from becoming impassable.

questions.minister: Minister of Transport, Works, Supply and Communication
parts: (a)    what radius the communication tower erected at Senior Chief Milambo’s Place covers;
(b)    whether the Government has an plans to facilitate the extension of the radius; and

(c)    if so, when extension works will commence. NOTICE OF MOTION AND ORDER OF THE DAY Mr S Chungu Report of the Parliamentary Select Committee: That this House do adopt the Report of the Parliamentary Select Committee appointed to scrutinise the Presidential appointment of Mr Likando Kalaluka to serve as Attorney-General of the Republic of Zambia, for the Fourth Session of the Eleventh National Assembly, laid on the Table of the House on 24th March, 2015. 1    The Tax Appeals Tribunal (Amendment) Bill            (N.A.B 1/2015) Committee Stage
